    • connectToVirtualClient

      public void connectToVirtualClient(VirtualClient vc, CommunicationHandler communicationHandler)

      Parameters:
      vc - the VirtualClient
      communicationHandler - handler for connection

    • onEndGameEvent

      public void onEndGameEvent(EndGameEvent event)
      Method called by Virtual Client if the connection is lost. Server removes the thread from execution and remove the virtual Client bonded with the nickname of disconnected player. Calls method skip turn on controller.
      Specified by:
      onEndGameEvent in interface EndGameListener
      Parameters:
      event - of the connection

    • onDisconnect

      Disconnects and removes the virtual client from the server if the game has not started.
      Parameters:
      vc - virtual client
